<!-- source-hash: c155c514d00751c218d06ee8b6e2aaf0 -->
A data transfer object representing tool URL configuration information, typically used in API responses for external integrations.

## Key Components

- **ToolUrlResponse** - Main DTO class with Lombok annotations for automatic getter/setter generation
- **url** - String field for the endpoint URL
- **port** - String field for the port number  
- **type** - String field for categorizing the URL type
- **Swagger annotations** - OpenAPI documentation with examples

## Usage Example

```java
// Building a ToolUrlResponse
ToolUrlResponse response = ToolUrlResponse.builder()
    .url("https://rmm.example.com")
    .port("8443")
    .type("DASHBOARD")
    .build();

// Using constructor
ToolUrlResponse response = new ToolUrlResponse(
    "https://api.tool.com", 
    "443", 
    "API"
);

// Accessing fields (via Lombok @Data)
String endpoint = response.getUrl();
response.setPort("9443");
```

This DTO is commonly used in REST APIs to return tool configuration details, with built-in Swagger documentation for API specifications.
